definition: classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
"right open box" radical (Kangxi radical 22), occurring in 区, 医, 匹 etc
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4

definition: to be equal to/to be well-matched/rival
lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 ti3 yu4 chang3

definition: aspirin (loanword) (variant of 阿司匹林[a1 si1 pi3 lin2])
Olympic Organizing Committee/abbr. to 奧組委|奥组委
pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4 Zu3 zhi1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會

sentences.english: Who can begin to understand his energies?
sentences.chinese: 誰又可以或許大概匹裏劈臉體味祂的能量呢？

sentences.english: The cheesemonger woke when they stopped to change the horses and sent for a fresh hamper.
sentences.chinese: 在換馬匹和派人找一個新的大籃子時，奶酪商醒了。

sentences.english: The new couple divorced each other.
The brewery had 25 heavy horses delivering beer in London.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒廠有25匹高頭大馬在倫敦城中運送啤酒。

sentences.english: It's a vile attempt to extort money, " said Mr. Pickwick."
sentences.chinese: “這是下流的敲竹槓的企圖，”匹克威克先生說。

sentences.english: And she followed him into the kitchen like a pony on high heels.
sentences.chinese: 她跟着他來到廚房，像匹踩着高蹺的小馬。

sentences.english: "Master Scaufflaire," he inquired, "have you a good horse?"
sentences.chinese: “斯戈弗萊爾師父，”他問道，“您有匹好馬嗎？”

sentences.english: They had seven hundred and thirty-six horses, two hundred and forty-five transport beasts.
sentences.chinese: 他們有馬七百三十六匹，騾子二百四十五匹。

sentences.english: They had seven hundred and thirty-six horses, two hundred and forty-five transport beasts.
sentences.chinese: 他們有馬七百三十六匹，騾子二百四十五匹。

sentences.english: In this paper, a quantitative analysis of error factors for pattern-matching guidance is performed.
sentences.chinese: 本文對圖像匹配製導的誤差因素作了定量分析。

sentences.english: We found him a nice horse — a good mover who could gallop.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現他是匹好馬，跑起來風馳電掣。

sentences.english: I probably got a lot of encouragement from Price Pethel.
sentences.chinese: 或許是我在匹萊斯派修那得到了很多的鼓勵。

sentences.english: It was drawn by an old bay horse and a little grey-and-white burro.
sentences.chinese: 拉着它的是匹栗色的馬和一頭灰白的小毛驢。

sentences.english: Mr. Pickwick, who had been deeply investigating the interior of the pigeon-pie, readily assented.
sentences.chinese: 深深地鑽研着鴿子餅內幕的匹克威克先生欣然首肯了。
